declare @q nvarchar(4000), @user int, @admin bit, @unit varchar(32), @language char(1), @sys varchar(32), @code varchar(32), @name nvarchar(512), @taxCode varchar(32), @taxRate decimal(38, 12) declare @baseCurrency varchar(32), @voucherTemplate varchar(32) select @baseCurrency = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' select @voucherTemplate = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_mau_ct_dv'
select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @language = @@language, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @unit = isnull(@ma_dvcs, @@unit)
create table #r (ky_hieu varchar(32), so_hd varchar(32), ngay_hd datetime, ngay_ph datetime, ma_tt varchar(32), hinh_thuc_tt nvarchar(512), ma_nt varchar(8), ty_gia decimal(38, 12), t_tien decimal(38, 12), thue_suat decimal(38, 12), t_thue decimal(38, 12), t_thanh_toan decimal(38, 12), t_thue1 decimal(38, 12), t_thue0 decimal(38, 12), t_thue5 decimal(38, 12), t_thue10 decimal(38, 12), ghi_chu nvarchar(512), ky_hieu_d varchar(32), ma_vt varchar(32), ten_vt nvarchar(512), dvt nvarchar(32), so_luong decimal(38, 12), gia decimal(38, 12), tien decimal(38, 12), thue_suat_d decimal(38, 12), thue decimal(38, 12), tk_vt varchar(32), stt int, ma_kh varchar(32), ten_kh nvarchar(512), dia_chi nvarchar(512), ma_so_thue nvarchar(512), ong_ba nvarchar(512), tk varchar(32), ten_tk nvarchar(512), ref varchar(32), ten_vt_goc nvarchar(512), dvt_goc nvarchar(32), ma_mau_ct nvarchar(128), tien_ext decimal(38, 12), ma_thue_ext varchar(32), thue_suat_ext decimal(38, 12), thue_ext decimal(38, 12), type char(1) )
select a.ma_thue as ma_thue_mvcn, a.nhom_thue as nhom_thue_mvcn, b.thue_suat as thue_suat_mvcn into #dmthuemvcn from dmthuemvcn a with(nolock) left join dmthue b with(nolock) on a.ma_thue = b.ma_thue where a.status = 1
insert into #r( ky_hieu, so_hd, ngay_hd, ngay_ph, ma_tt, hinh_thuc_tt, ma_nt, ty_gia, t_tien, thue_suat, t_thue, t_thanh_toan, t_thue1, t_thue0, t_thue5, t_thue10, ghi_chu, ky_hieu_d, ma_vt, ten_vt, dvt, so_luong, gia, tien, thue_suat_d, thue, tk_vt, stt, ma_kh, ten_kh, dia_chi, ma_so_thue, ong_ba, tk, ten_tk, ref, ten_vt_goc, dvt_goc, ma_mau_ct, tien_ext, ma_thue_ext, thue_suat_ext, thue_ext, type) select a.ky_hieu, a.so_hd, a.ngay_hd, a.ngay_ph, '' as ma_tt, a.hinh_thuc_tt, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, a.t_tien, a.thue_suat, a.t_thue, a.t_thanh_toan, a.t_thue1, a.t_thue0, a.t_thue5, a.t_thue10, a.ghi_chu, a.ky_hieu_d, '' as ma_vt, a.ten_vt, a.dvt as dvt, a.so_luong, a.gia, a.tien, a.thue_suat_d, a.thue, '', stt, '' as ma_kh, a.ten_kh, a.dia_chi, a.ma_so_thue, '' as ong_ba, '' as tk, '' as ten_tk, '', a.ten_vt, a.dvt, case when isnull(a.ma_mau_ct, '') = '' then @voucherTemplate else a.ma_mau_ct end, case when isnull(a.thue_suat_ext, '') = '' then null else a.tien_ext end, isnull(b.ma_thue_mvcn, ''), b.thue_suat_mvcn, case when isnull(a.thue_suat_ext, '') = '' then null else a.thue_ext end, case when a.thue_suat_ext in (select dbo.ff_GetTaxCodeExt(nhom_thue_mvcn, thue_suat_mvcn) from #dmthuemvcn) then '1' else '0' end from @@table a left join #dmthuemvcn b on a.thue_suat_ext = dbo.ff_GetTaxCodeExt(b.nhom_thue_mvcn, b.thue_suat_mvcn) and a.thue_suat_ext <> 'KHAC'
-- Customer Code declare @w nvarchar(4000), @useUnit tinyint select @useUnit = 0, @w = '', @code = '', @name = ten_kh, @taxCode = ma_so_thue from #r where stt = 1 if '&Customer.Code;' <> '' begin select @useUnit = 1 exec AI_ERP$System$GetUnitFilter @unit, @user, @admin, 'dmkh', 'ma_kh', 'ma_dvcs', 'ds_dvcs', 'dmkhdv', @w output end select @q = 'select top 1 @code = ma_kh from dmkh where ma_so_thue = ''' + replace(@taxCode, '''', '''''') + ''' and status = 1 and cc_yn = 1' + case when @w = '' then '' else ' and ' + @w end exec sp_executesql @q, N'@code varchar(32) output', @code output
if @code = '' begin create table #k(code varchar(32)) insert into #k exec AI_ERP$App$GetCodeByName 'dmkh', 'ma_kh', 'ten_kh', @name, @unit, @user, @admin, 'cc_yn = 1', 1, @useUnit select @code = code from #k delete #k end update #r set ma_kh = @code update #r set ong_ba = rtrim(b.doi_tac), tk = b.tk, ma_tt = rtrim(b.ma_tt), hinh_thuc_tt = c.ten_tt from #r a left join dmkh b on a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh left join dmtt c on b.ma_tt = c.ma_tt -- update #r set ten_tk = case when @language = 'V' then b.ten_tk else b.ten_tk2 end from #r a left join dmtk b on a.tk = b.tk update #r set ma_nt = @baseCurrency where ma_nt = '' or (ma_nt = @baseCurrency and ty_gia = 1) update #r set ty_gia = 1 where ma_nt = @baseCurrency
-- select a.ky_hieu, a.so_hd, a.ngay_hd, a.ngay_ph, a.hinh_thuc_tt, a.ma_nt, a.ty_gia, a.t_tien, a.thue_suat, a.t_thue, a.t_thanh_toan, a.t_thue1, a.t_thue0, a.t_thue5, a.t_thue10, a.ghi_chu, a.ky_hieu_d, rtrim(a.ma_vt) as ma_vt, a.ten_vt, a.dvt, a.so_luong, a.gia, a.tien, a.thue_suat_d, a.thue, a.tk_vt, a.stt, a.ma_tt as ma_tt, rtrim(a.ma_kh) as ma_kh, rtrim(a.ten_kh) as ten_kh, rtrim(a.dia_chi) as dia_chi, rtrim(a.ma_so_thue) as ma_so_thue, rtrim(a.ong_ba) as ong_ba, rtrim(a.tk) as tk, rtrim(a.ten_tk) as ten_tk, a.ten_vt as ten_vt_tax, cast('' as varchar(32)) as ma_thue_tax, cast(0 as numeric(19, 2)) as thue_suat_tax, cast(0 as numeric(19, 2)) as tien_tax, cast(0 as numeric(19, 2)) as thue_tax, a.ref, a.ten_vt_goc, a.dvt_goc, case when @language = 'V' then b.ten_tk else b.ten_tk2 end as ten_tk_vt, case when @language = 'V' then c.ten_kh else c.ten_kh2 end as ten_kh_n, a.ma_mau_ct, case when @language = 'V' then isnull(d.ten_mau_ct, '') else isnull(d.ten_mau_ct2, '') end as ten_mau_ct, cast('' as varchar(32)) as tk_thue_no, cast('' as nvarchar(512)) as ten_tk_thue_no, cast(0 as tinyint) as tk_cn, tien_ext, ma_thue_ext, thue_suat_ext, thue_ext, type into #k1 from #r a left join dmtk b on a.tk_vt = b.tk left join dmkh c on a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh left join dmmauct d on a.ma_mau_ct = d.ma_mau_ct order by a.stt
-- update #k1 set ma_thue_tax = '' where type = '0' update #k1 set thue_suat_tax = thue_suat_d, tien_tax = tien, thue_tax = thue update #k1 set thue_suat_tax = 0, tien_tax = 0 where ma_thue_tax = '' update #k1 set ma_thue_ext = rtrim(b.ma_thue) from #k1 a left join dmthue b on replace(str(a.ma_thue_ext, 2), ' ', '0') = b.ma_thue where len(a.ma_thue_ext) = 1 and type = '1' update #k1 set ma_thue_ext = rtrim(isnull(b.ma_thue, '')) from #k1 a left join dmthue b on a.ma_thue_ext = b.ma_thue where len(a.ma_thue_ext) > 1 and type = '1' update #k1 set tk_thue_no = rtrim(a.tk_thue_no3), ten_tk_thue_no = case when @language = 'V' then b.ten_tk else b.ten_tk2 end, tk_cn = b.tk_cn from #k1 k join dmthue a on k.ma_thue_ext = a.ma_thue left join dmtk b on a.tk_thue_no3 = b.tk where k.type = '1' update #k1 set thue_suat_ext = 0 where ma_thue_ext = '' or thue_suat_ext < 0 update #k1 set ma_thue_tax = '', type = '1' from #k1 where isnull(thue_ext, -1) <> -1 and type = '0'
-- select '' as message, 'this.frameElement.result = @@result;parent.set$Grid$ImportXmlResult(this.frameElement);' as script select * from #k1 order by stt return
